title: Acting President approves FST membersâ€™ appointments
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 09 (APP): Acting President Syed Yousaf Raza Gillani has approved the appointment of members of the Federal Service Tribunal (FST), on the advice of Prime Minister.
Advocate Bahlul Khattak, retired District and Sessions Judge Chaudhry Abdul Qayyum and Advocate Chaudhry Muhammad Akram Khaksar were appointed as judicial members of the federal service tribunal, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release on Saturday.
The acting president also approved the appointments of Sarwat Tahira Habib and Nadeem Irshad Kiyani as executive members.
